price: Na Wallahi! Nitayafanyia vitimbi masanamu yenu haya baada ya mkisha geuka kwenda zenu.
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
footnotes: Na akasema moyoni mwake: Naapa kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, nitayafanyia vitimbi haya masanamu yenu niyavunje pale mtapo ondoka, ili mpate kuona upotovu wenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
